DelegatedPersonal.description: Allows the app to read your tenant's service announcement messages on behalf of the signed-in user. Messages may include information about new or changed features.

DelegatedWork.description: Allows the app to read your tenant's service announcement messages on behalf of the signed-in user. Messages may include information about new or changed features.

Application.description: Allows the app to read your tenant's service announcement messages, without a signed-in user. Messages may include information about new or changed features.
